members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Checks if the specified address is in the supplied control access list.
Array or collection of addresses. Address to check. True - if found match, False - if not -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:ConnectAndPlayDTMF
member.summary: Class to play DTMF digits from Var("InBandDial") after the connection.

member.name: T:DropLine
member.summary: Class to fully disconnect the line (including connected lines).
